name: Baldi's in a Business Game?!
description:
This is a Baldi's mod.

Baldi is working in an office and is the #1 worker in the office. This game was inspired by the Source Film Maker (SFM) animation "Baldi, the interview". Also,  I want the 4 channels; Baldi, IULTM, FusionZGamer, and maybe MaryoGames to play this. Although, it would be great if you uploaded gameplay footage to YouTube. In the screenshots, you'll see the workers.
